name: Pachinko: Chinese Pinball
overview: Despite it's name, this is NOT a simulation of a Pachinko machine, rather it's a pinball game made to look "similar" to a Pachinko machine. The game has up to 4 players alternating turns, and was developed by Donald Richter using Olaf Lubeck's Pinball Construction Kit. It was released in 1991 for free as part of Pcs Club Disk #19.
